citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), Resource Assessment and Conservation Engineering (RACE)
citeinfo.title: Pacific Ocean MBT Profile Data by NOAA/AFSC/RACE (PMEL EPIC)

descript.abstract: MicroBathyTermograph data from the Pacific Ocean include temperature and pressure. There are 4714 files available for plotting and download. On-line access to the data and sectional cross plots is available. Access to download data from individual casts in either ASCII or netCDF format is included. A variety of plots of properties versus depth and property versus property plots can be generated on the fly and displayed to your screen. On-line access to the data are accessible via a number of data selection utilities. These utilities allow you to search the database and extract datasets meeting criteria such as geographic location, date and time, season of the year, and various other criteria. Data were collected by the NOAA/AFSC/RACE scientists and made available through the PMEL EPIC Web Brower .
descript.purpose: To disseminate MBT data collected by scientists at the Resource Assessment and Conservation Engineering Division.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
